Title: Evan Almighty
Overview: Junior congressman Evan Baxter, whose wish is to "change the world" is heard by none other than God. When God appears with the perplexing request to build an ark, Evan is sure he is losing it.
production_companies: Columbia Pictures, Universal Pictures, Spyglass Entertainment, Shady Acres Entertainment, Original Film, Playtone, Relativity Media
Cast: Steve Carell, Lauren Graham, John Goodman
